Others: The article discusses the upcoming match between Hong Kong and India in the Asia Cup 2022, highlighting the close game between the two teams in the 2018 Asia Cup where Hong Kong came close to upsetting India.
The article mentions that several members from the 2018 Hong Kong team are still part of the current team, which could potentially help Hong Kong mount a serious challenge against India.

The article also discusses the challenges faced by Hong Kong since the 2018 Asia Cup, including a tricky period due to the pandemic, and their recent performances in the Asia Cup Qualifier and T20 World Cup Qualifier B.
